title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5907.3 - Responsibility for prompt payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5907.3 - Responsibility for prompt payment

State Regulations

The manager of finance and administration shall have the
responsibility for the implementation of the prompt payment policy and the
prompt payment of all proper invoices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5907.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
